metadata.name: Party Pepper #1
metadata.description:
Hot Sauce Pepper Party is a series of 10,000 3D-animated, 'Party Peppers' dancing across a variety of Party Places. Owning a Party Pepper allows one to craft their own bottle of hot sauce, branding it with an NFT of which they own the commercial rights.

Owning 3 Party Peppers crafts a fully custom batch of hot sauce, which is then sold online and splits profits 50/50 between the holder and community. Community members craft their own group hot sauces through voting rights in our hot sauce DAO.

Backed by the largest hot sauce distributor in the US and created by professional augmented reality artists, Hot Sauce Pepper Party is as visually appealing as the IRL consumable utility built into the metadata. Come join the party today!
